Has anyone ever had success using a File Field to allow Word docs to be uploaded but then converted on the file to webpages?
using something like this inside HubSpot: <https://github.com/lalalic/docx2html>

can developer help me just get the Filename from the File Field, not the full URL: {{ module.legal_file_field }}, I have tried {{ module.legal_file_field.filename }} and others but cannot find documentation on how to just pull the filename
